name: Captain Skunkbeard
description:
This game was made for Global Game Jam 2021!

Ahoy matey! Captain Skunkbeard has found his lost treasure at last!

Use gamepad or keyboard and mouse to control Captain Skunkbeard. Find the treasure chests and enter Skull Mountain to win!

Iain Lobb (Dull Dude - itch.io)- Programmer / Unity setup 

Ellie Harrodine - Environment Artist

Doug Kellett - Character Artist, VFX Artist

Connor Leigh (StealthySloth - itch.io)- Level Designer

Seth Lobb - Music Production, Logo Design
